column6:
Thanks to the man called Kaine, Spider-Girl has seen the future and knows that she is destined to die at the hands of a Scrier. Will the unexpected return of Felicity Hardy as the Scarlet Spider help save Spider-Girl...or doom her?,2006,3
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Sal Buscema | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Ron Frenz | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | letterer:Dave Sharpe
